title: Birmingham (England)
name: Villa Park
content: B6 6HE. Home of Aston Villa F.C. Birmingham's most successful football club having won 7 FA Cups, 7 league titles, and one European Cup. Â£25-35, capacity 42,786. Accessed with the Number 7 bus from the City Centre, or a train to Witton (don't be fooled, this is next door to the stadium) or Aston, a fairly long walk from the stadium, just follow the crowd, from New Street station.
